title: ID Generator Singleton
description: Create a singleton object that generates unique sequential IDs.
instructions: Create an object IdGenerator with a nextId() function that returns incrementing integers starting from 1. Print three consecutive IDs.

hints.text: Use the object keyword to create a singleton
Keep a private var counter inside the object
Return ++counter to get the next ID

commonMistakes.correction: Use object keyword for a singleton

commonMistakes.mistake: Starting counter at 1 and using counter++
commonMistakes.consequence: First ID returned is 1, then increments after
commonMistakes.correction: Start at 0 and use ++counter, or start at 1 and use counter++ then return

commonMistakes.consequence: External code can modify the counter
commonMistakes.correction: Keep counter private, expose only nextId()
